content:
Positives:
1) Some of the summaries are good.
2) Some need to be improved.

Comments:
In Article-1, price rate of gold and silver in international market is missing. Also, contains the spelling mistakes in line-1: (రెఒండు, గ్రములకి, "కిలో  కి వంద కి" -> "కిలో వంద కి")
In Article-2, last sentence is repetitve and don't cover the factual details (overall prices of gold and silver). Also, contains the spelling mistakes (ఓచిన) in line-3.
In Article-3, the article is written as narrating not reporting the news. Also, contains the spelling mistakes (వారకి, ఎన్నూ, అద్ర్కున్తున్నాం, మ లేవు, "నిజం అని అనేది" --> "నిజం అనేది", తానాడిన, శిలిలో) and spacing issues (అంటేఇంకొందరు)
In Article-4, Summary written in the native telangana slang (చేస్తుండు) and leads to narrative. Also, contains spelling mistakes (పెట్టరు, దిల్ల్రాజ్, దిన్ని, మెదిల, హిల్ద్, సమాచరం, నచలేదు, ఉంటె) and spacing issues (గతం లోలాగే)
In Article-5, half of the relevant information is missing. Last sentence is not good. Also, contains the spelling mistakes (పడుతున్ఆన, లొన్గిపొఇన, భెల్, భెల్ తోవచ్చింది, తర్వతకొడుకు)
In Article-6, First sentence is misleading the article. The sentence formation is not good and need some effort to understand the context. Most of the releavant information is covered.
In Article-7, the information related to the bill (remuneration) is missing here. Overall summary is good.
In Article-8, the sentence formation need to be improved. Also, contains the spelling mistakes (వేస్కొని) and spacing issues (ఇదికీలకపాత్ర)
In Article-9, Summary should not begin with the starting sentence of article (అమరావతి : టిడిపీ). Missing the relevant information.
In Article-10, Summary should not begin with the starting sentence of article (గుంటూరు : వైఎస్). Also, contains the spelling mistakes (బయ్పడుతుంది) and spacing issues (లక్స్మినారాయానతన్ననివిమర్షలు)
